thread.title: TIA board re-elects Watkins as chair; other members retain roles
thread.title_full: TIA board re-elects Watkins as chair; other members retain roles

author: Eric Snider
title: TIA board re-elects Watkins as chair; other members retain roles
text:
TBBJ File Tampa International Airport Members of the Hillsborough County Aviation Authority Board like their group make-up, because they voted this week to retain Robert Watkins as chairman, as well as keep the others in the same roles. Garry Harrod was re-elected vice chairman and Sam Rashid stays treasurer. Hillsborough County Commissioner Victor Crist remains secretary, and Tampa Mayor Bob Buckhorn continues his roles as assistant treasurer and assistant secretary. Watkins, 64, joined the board in 2011 shortly after CEO Joe Lopano came on board. Watkins is a certified public accountant and president of Robert Watkins and Company. Gov. Rick Scott reappointed him to the authority last week. The current board is lording over the nearly $1 billion expansion of Tampa International Airport . Recently, the five-member body navigated through a highly contested redevelopment of the airportâ€™s concessions program, which produced its share of controversy.
